Chess and Cheers: Hand & Brain

22nd March 2025 | 4:00 PM - 7:00 PM

Event Details

  • Chess and Cheers - Powered by Enterro: Step into the ultimate Hand & Brain edition of Chess & Cheers at Uru Brewery! This event celebrates teamwork, creativity, and quick thinking like never before! In this special format, one partner becomes the “Brain,” calling out the type of piece to move, while the other, the “Hand,” brings the strategy to life on the board. It’s a game of trust, laughter, and surprises, where collaboration is the key to victory.

Special Pair Offer: Come as a mixed pair (one male, one female) and get a ₹200 discount on your total entry fee!

Please Note: The discount is only applicable if your team consists of one male and one female. If the pair is not mixed, the discount will not be valid.

Disclaimer: Drinks will be served at URU. Kids are welcome to join but must be accompanied by their parents

What’s Included

  • Chance to win Premium Wooden Chess Sets from Enterro Chess through a Lucky Draw
  • 3 Hours of multiple Fun-filled Hand&Brain Chess
  • Ticket includes Food/Beverage coupon worth ₹200

Game Variations:

  • Casual Hand & Brain Chess (Swiss Format): Dive into the fun and collaborative world of Hand & Brain chess! In this Swiss Format tournament spanning 6-7 rounds, pair up with a partner to strategize and laugh your way through each game. One of you will be the "Brain," calling out the type of piece to move, while the other, the "Hand," makes the actual moves on the board. It's a perfect blend of teamwork, creativity, and friendly banter, making every match an unforgettable experience. Celebrate chess in its most interactive and entertaining form!

Looking to Upgrade your Chess Gear?

Enhance your chess experience with premium chess sets from Enterro Chess. Explore a variety of designs and styles to find the perfect fit for your game.

Exclusive Discounts:

  • Use coupon code BANGLORECHESS for a flat ₹100 discount on all products.
  • Use coupon code BANGCHESS200 for a flat ₹200 discount on purchases above ₹2500.

  • Visit: enterro.in
  • Email: info@enterro.in
  • Call: 7889133065

Terms & Conditions

By participating in this event, you agree to the following terms:

  • Tickets: All tickets are non-refundable. Late arrivals may miss rounds, so please arrive at least 15 minutes early for check-in.
  • Venue Rules: Participants must follow venue policies on decorum and safety. The organizer is not responsible for lost or misplaced belongings.
  • Photography & Media: By attending, you consent to photos and videos taken during the event being used for promotional purposes by the organizer.

Contact Us: bangalorechessclubofficial@gmail.com | @bangalorechessclub

Event Location

Uru Brewpark
Bannerghatta Rd, 4th Phase J.P.Nagar, Bengaluru, India

Address

Bangalore, India bangalorechessclubofficial@gmail.com

Info

Bangalore Chess Club is the largest offline Chess Community in India where we aim to promote chess as a non competitive sport across ages and skill levels. Always striving to make chess fun.
